text:
Jan 2 & 3
• Pre-fill Searched Phone Number in Patient Creation form
• Medication Request | Convert dosage instruction to array with refactor
• Fix Date Picker not consistently showing up in Chrome
• AllergyQuestion component | Move Last occurrence field, and fit table without scroll
• EMR types restructure for Symptoms, Diagnosis, Allergy
• Structured response view | Symptom, Diagnosis, Allergy
• Issue Created - Cleanup Keyboard Shortcut implementation
Next
• Structured response view for the remaining types

Jan 6th - 17th
• Desktop and Mobile Redesign based on Figma for
◦ Medication Request UI
◦ Medication Statement UI
◦ Prescription and Prescription Print Preview Page UI
• Allergy Intolerance pre-fill with upsert and some UI changes
• MultiValueSet field created for reducing horizontal space usage by clubbing related ValueSet fields
• Time spent researching
◦ FHIR for request types, examples etc.
◦ Snomed to pre-fill Medication Request form fields like strength, unit etc
• Created view for Structured Response (which eventually got ditched as we're displaying only non-structured responses now)
• Multiple discussions with Vinu regarding designs
Next:
• Structured Pre-fill for Diagnosis and Symptoms
• Research using ValueSet expand to receive India Specific Data (similar to Snomed CT Indian version)
• Medication Administration UI redesign based on Figma

Jan 20
• Structured pre-fill for Symptom and Diagnosis
• Research and explore Snomed CT Indian version and discussion with Bodhi and Vignesh - found an API that returns Indian data but might need further research
Next:
• Participate in migration

• Continue Research on Snomed CT Indian version
• Medication Administration UI redesign based on Figma
